name: SetDeploymentAlias
description:
Assigns a new alias to a Vercel deployment.

Use this tool to create or update an alias for a specific Vercel deployment. If the alias is currently linked to another deployment, it will be reassigned to the specified deployment.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment to assign the alias to. This identifier is crucial for specifying which deployment will receive the new alias.

value_schema.description: The ID of the deployment the aliases should be listed for

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the team to perform the alias assignment on behalf of. Required for team-based operations.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. This identifies the team for the deployment operation.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: deployment_alias
parameters.description: The alias to assign to the specified Vercel deployment.

value_schema.description: The alias we want to assign to the deployment defined in the URL

parameters.name: redirect_hostname
parameters.description: Hostname to redirect the alias to, using status code 307. This will override the deployment ID from the URL.

value_schema.description: The redirect property will take precedence over the deployment id from the URL and consists of a hostname (like test.com) to which the alias should redirect using status code 307

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment the aliases should be listed for

value_schema.description: The ID of the deployment the aliases should be listed for

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: The alias we want to assign to the deployment defined in the URL

value_schema.description: The alias we want to assign to the deployment defined in the URL

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: The redirect property will take precedence over the deployment id from the URL and consists of a hostname (like test.com) to which the alias should redirect using status code 307

value_schema.description: The redirect property will take precedence over the deployment id from the URL and consists of a hostname (like test.com) to which the alias should redirect using status code 307
